title: BadEnd.Start
body:
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
You know why you're here don't you?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
You keep losing assets in the caves
our numbers are way down as a result
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
It isn't in our budget to
...aquire
more assets
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
So the decision has been made
We're going to write off our losses
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
....
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
So that means
this is where you end
<<goToScene DialogAndPortraitContainer TitleScreen>>
